[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [IConnectionPreviewer](./blockly.iconnectionpreviewer_interface.md)

## IConnectionPreviewer interface

Displays visual "previews" of where a block will be connected if it is dropped.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IConnectionPreviewer 
```

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[dispose()](./blockly.iconnectionpreviewer_interface.dispose_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Dispose of any references held by this connection previewer.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[hidePreview()](./blockly.iconnectionpreviewer_interface.hidepreview_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Hide any previews that are currently displayed.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[previewConnection(draggedConn, staticConn)](./blockly.iconnectionpreviewer_interface.previewconnection_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Display a connection preview where the draggedCon connects to the staticCon, and no block is being relaced.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[previewReplacement(draggedConn, staticConn, replacedBlock)](./blockly.iconnectionpreviewer_interface.previewreplacement_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Display a connection preview where the draggedCon connects to the staticCon, replacing the replacedBlock (currently connected to the staticCon).


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
